statements.quote: And yet, Obama today spoke in front of a much smaller crowd than this, by the way, and there was a protester and a protester that likes us. And what happened is they wouldn't put the cameras on them. They kept the cameras on Obama, and I said, "That's strange." You saw it today on television, right? He was talking to the protester, screaming at him, really screaming at him.

name: Obama screamed at protester during Clinton rally
